Title: Provides domestic violence victims and crime victims with supervision while taking depositions
Summary: Enacts the "Lydia Peikon Cotz act"; provides domestic violence victims and crime victims with supervision while taking depositions; directs the court to provide a secure location within the courthouse, and a court officer, for such persons taking depositions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to providing domestic violence victims or crime victims with supervision while taking depositions
